Method Detail

configure

public void configure(Config.Configurator configurator)
               throws WizardException
Configure a wizard. The configuration object passed is updated with information retrieved from the request object with which the configurator was created. The following parameters are accepted:
  • popupid
  • objectnumber

Overrides:
configure in class Config.SubConfig
Parameters:
configurator - the configurator containing request information
Throws:
WizardException - if expected parameters were not given
Since:
MMBase-1.6.4
